spec_data.Name: perl-DBIx-POS
spec_data.Description:
DBIx-POS subclasses Pod::Parser to define a POD dialect for writing a SQL
dictionary for an application, and uses code from Class::Singleton to make
the resulting structure easily accessible.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:59:48 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Define a dictionary of SQL statements in a POD dialect (POS)
